pages.text: 38|43|Arau ami te'omka dana karailo te'omra paraiyalabarga arau te'omlokara darae arau bahuto, amara phalara paraa anugrahasbaraupa arau bodhasakti sampanna lokasakalara babe upadesasbaraupa.

38|44|Arau (ami te'omka adesa karailo) ‘tumi emuthi ghamha loraa arau se'itorae tumi koboraa tathapi'o sapata bhanga nakaraiba’. Niscaya ami te'omka dhairyasila pa'ichilo. Kimana ye uttama banda achila te'om! Niscaya te'om achila amara abhimukhi.
38|45|Arau smarana karaa, amara banda ibraahima, ichahakba arau iyakubara katha, te'omloka ataye achila saktisali arau suksmadarsi.
38|46|Niscaya ami te'omlokaka eta bisesa gunara adhikarai karaichilo, seya achila akhiraatara smarana.
38|47|Arau niscaya te'omloka achila amara ocarata manonita uttama bandasakalara an'yatama.
38|48|Arau smarana karaa, ichama'ila, ala-iyaca'a arau jula-kiphalara katha, e'omloka ataye achila sajjanasakalara antarbhukta.
38|49|E'ito eta smarana. Niscaya muttakbisakalara babe ache uttama abasa
38|50|cirasthayi jannata, yara duraarasamuha te'omlokara babe unmukta.
38|51|Tata te'omloke a'uji bahiba, tata te'omloke bahu dharanara phalamula arau paniya anibalai ka’ba.
38|52|Arau te'omlokara ocarata thakiba anatanayana samabayasiya (gabhurau choraalisakala).
38|53|E'ito hicapa dirasara babe tomalokaka diya pratisrauti.
38|54|Niscaya e'ito ami pradana karaa raijikba yito ketiya'o nihsesa naha’ba.
38|55|E'itorae'i. Niscaya simalanghanakarai bilakara babe ache nikrstatama pratyarartanasthala
38|56|jahannama, tata sihamta agnidagdha ha’ba, (eya) kimana ye nikrsta bisraamasthala
38|57|E'itorae'i. Eteke sihamte utala pani arau gela-pumjara soraada la'omka.
38|58|Arau ache e'i jatiya bibhinna dharanara sasti.
38|59|Eya eta bahini, tomalokara lagate'i praraesa karaiche. Sihamtara babe kono abhinandana na'i. Niscaya sihamta ju'ita jbaliba.
38|60|Anusaraisakale ka’ba, ‘baram tomaloke'o (ju'ita jbaliba), tomalokara babe'o kono abhinandana na'i. Tomaloke'i amara babe e'i bipada anicha. Eteke kimana ye nikrsta e'i abasasthala!’
38|61|Sihamte ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Yiye amara babe e'i bipada karhiya'i aniche, jahannamata taka tumi dbiguna sasti diya’.
